name: Gum Guy
description: This tough energetic 2D platformer challenges you. The plot is fun and the main hero is terribly cute. Gum Guy lives in the drains with his gum family. But the soul calls for adventures. One day our hero gets lost. You become his guide through the dangers and wonders of the city above his home.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.4GHz or faster Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or Equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1024 MB available space
